definition[0]: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things
example[0]: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
example[1]: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
example[2]: its dominant position within the group
definition[1]: controlling or trying to control other people or things â€“ used to show disapproval
definition[2]: a dominant gene causes a child to have a particular physical feature or illness, even if it has been passed on from only one parent
example[4]: The disease is under the control of a single dominant gene.
definition[3]: the fifth note of a musical scale of eight notes
